Package PegSolitaireGame

Interface PegSolitaire.Direction

All Known Implementing Classes:
PegSolitaireEngine.Direction_Peg
Enclosing interface:
PegSolitaire
public static interface PegSolitaire.Direction
The interface of the enum type that describes in what direction is an action targeted to.

  • Field Details

    • _directionList

      static final int[][] _directionList
      The four possible directions in the board in 2D vector form.

      The directions are in the following order starting from index 0 to 3: Up, Down, Left and Right

  • Method Details

    • vectorForm

      int[] vectorForm()
      Return the vector form of the direction.
      Returns:
      An array as the following {vertically, horizontally}
